# Robot Operating System (ROS)

## Quick Links

- [ROS Wiki](http://wiki.ros.org): primary reference for distro details, APIs, and package index.
- [ROS 2 Documentation](https://docs.ros.org/en/humble): jump into current ROS 2 guides (switch distro in the top left).

---

## Recommended Distros

| Track | Distro (ROS) | Ubuntu | Notes |
|-------|-------------|--------|-------|
| LTS | Jazzy Jalisco (ROS 2) | 24.04 (Noble) | Latest LTS; best for new development where Ubuntu 24.04 is available. |
| LTS | Humble Hawksbill (ROS 2) | 22.04 (Jammy) | Stable, widely used; supported through May 2027. |
| LTS | Noetic Ninjemys (ROS 1) | 20.04 (Focal) | Legacy ROS 1; maintenance ends May 2025. |
| STS | Iron Irwini (ROS 2) | 22.04 (Jammy) | Short-term support; bridge path toward Jazzy. |

---

## Starter Tutorials

- ROS 2: [Core tutorials (beginner, intermediate)](https://docs.ros.org/en/humble/Tutorials.html)
- ROS 2: [Writing a simple publisher/subscriber (Python)](https://docs.ros.org/en/humble/Tutorials/Beginner-Client-Libraries/Understanding-ROS2-Nodes/Creating-Your-First-ROS2-Package-Py.html)
- ROS 2: [URDF + RViz quickstart](https://docs.ros.org/en/humble/Tutorials/Intermediate/URDF/Modeling-a-Robot-with-URDF.html)
- ROS 1: [Official wiki tutorials](http://wiki.ros.org/ROS/Tutorials)
- Simulation: [Gazebo-ROS integration overview](https://classic.gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=ros_overview)
